cleanse_dispenser_body.description: Wipe the dispenser's body in order to cleanse it.

sanitize_dispenser_body.description: Wipe the dispenser's body to sanitize it.

clean_dispenser_surface.description: Clean the outer surface of the dispenser's body.

wipe_dispenser.description: Wipe the body of the dispenser to remove any residue or dust.

maintain_dispenser_cleanliness.description: Clean the body of the dispenser regularly to maintain its cleanliness.

clean_dispenser.description: Clean the body of the dispenser using cleaning agent.

clean_dispenser_body.description: Clean the body of the dispenser to maintain cleanliness.

wipe_dispenser_surface.description: Wipe the outside of the dispenser body for cleanliness.

press_dispenser_body.description: Press the dispenser body to dispense the desired product.

rotate_lid_to_open.description: Rotate the lid in a clockwise direction to open the dispenser.

clean_lid_after_use.description: Clean the lid after usage to maintain hygiene.

rotate_lid_to_seal.description: Rotate the lid in counter clockwise direction to seal the dispenser.

sanitize_lid.description: Cleanse the lid surface with a disinfectant to sanitize it.

rotate_lid_for_dispensing.description: Rotate the dispenser's lid in a clockwise direction for dispensing.

rotate_lid_to_close.description: Rotate the dispenser's lid in a counter clockwise direction to close.

clean_lid_surface.description: Wipe the dispenser's lid to maintain hygiene.

rotate_lid_clockwise.description: Rotate the lid for dispensing in clockwise direction.

rotate_lid_counter_clockwise.description: Rotate the lid in the counter clockwise direction.

wipe_lid.description: Clean the lid surface using a cloth.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to ensure hygiene.

rotate_lid_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the dispenser's lid in an anticlockwise direction.

clean_dispenser_and_parts.description: Clean the whole dispenser, its lid and the body.

operate_dispenser_and_cleanup.description: Rotate the lid to operate the dispenser and then clean it.

sanitize_dispenser_complete.description: Clean the entire dispenser, including the lid and body, to sanitize it.

clean_entire_dispenser.description: Wipe the whole dispenser including the lid and the body to maintain hygiene.

use_dispenser_and_clean.description: Use the dispenser by rotating the lid and clean it after use.

wipe_whole_dispenser.description: Wipe the entire dispenser including the lid and the body to remove any residue.

operate_dispenser.description: Operate the dispenser by rotating the lid. No need for cleaning afterwards.

clean_dispenser_full.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the lid and body.

use_and_clean.description: Use the dispenser by rotating the lid and clean it up after use.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the lid.

use_dispenser.description: Use the dispenser by rotating the lid.

complete_dispensing_cycle.description: Complete the dispensing cycle by rotating the lid and pressing the dispenser body.
